name: Lilypop
description:
— Prototype game. I may work on it more, I may not. —

Dash around popping bubbles and try to set a new high score. You must pass over a lily pad or pop an enemy each time you dash, or you lose the game.

Controls:

  • Aim with the mouse and click to dash.
  • Esc to quit.

Note: The builds are not extensively tested, particularly not on Mac. Please let me know if you have any issues.
